title: Quantum Mechanics
alt: You can also just ignore any science assertion where 'quantum mechanics' is the most complicated phrase in it.
transcript:
[Cueball and Ponytail stand facing each other, talking. Cueball has a small dog on a leash.]
Cueball: But dogs can observe the world, which means that according to quantum mechanics they must have souls.[Caption below the frame:]
Protip: You can safely ignore any sentence that includes the phrase "According to quantum mechanics".
